title: Foole that I was, who had so faire a state ...
author: Killigrew, Thomas, 1612-1683, attributed name.
notes: "An engraved portrait, by Hollar, of Thomas Killigrew the elder, with satirical verses." -- Thomason catalogue.
Verse attributed to Thomas Killigrew by Wing.
Title from first line of text.
Verse - "Foole that I was, who has so faire a state,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
